mapper.sql: SELECT SUM(deliver_rank + goods_rank + service_rank) / (COUNT(1) * 3) AS evaluationScore, count(1) AS evaluationCount, goods_id AS goodsId FROM mtmydb.mtmy_comment WHERE comment_id > ${mtmy_goods_commentId} GROUP BY goods_id
SELECT goods_id AS goodsId, SUM(goods_num) AS buyCount FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_mapping WHERE rec_id > ${mtmy_goods_recId} GROUP BY goods_id
mapper.select: SELECT rec_id AS recId FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_mapping ORDER BY rec_id DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT comment_id AS commentId FROM mtmydb.mtmy_comment ORDER BY comment_id DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT t1.goodsId, evaluationScore, evaluationCount, buyCount, IFNULL((SELECT tbs.goods_id FROM mtmydb.mtmy_goods_statistics tbs WHERE tbs.goods_id = t1.goodsId),"NULL")AS 'isExist' FROM () t1 LEFT JOIN ( ) t2 ON t2.goodsId = t1.goodsId UNION SELECT t2.goodsId, evaluationScore, evaluationCount, buyCount, IFNULL((SELECT tbs.goods_id FROM mtmydb.mtmy_goods_statistics tbs WHERE tbs.goods_id = t1.goodsId),"NULL")AS 'isExist' FROM () t1 RIGHT JOIN ( ) t2 ON t2.goodsId = t1.goodsId
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mtmydb.mtmy_goods_statistics ( goods_id, is_sham, evaluation_score, evaluation_count, buy_count, update_date ) VALUES ( #{goodsId}, '0', #{evaluationScore}, #{evaluationCount}, #{buyCount}, SYSDATE() )
